title: x/build: builder getting http 500 responses
body:
The windows-kardianos builder is sometimes getting 500 server errors. I think it started on June 18th.

2015/06/20 22:34:31 bad http response: 500 Internal Server Error
2015/06/20 22:48:18 bad http response: 500 Internal Server Error
2015/06/20 23:20:11 bad http response: 500 Internal Server Error
2015/06/21 00:00:18 bad http response: 500 Internal Server Error

2015/06/21 00:38:45 bad http response: 500 Internal Server Error
2015/06/21 01:18:38 bad http response: 500 Internal Server Error
2015/06/21 01:20:19 bad http response: 500 Internal Server Error
2015/06/21 02:43:24 bad http response: 500 Internal Server Error

2015/06/21 03:40:03 bad http response: 500 Internal Server Error
